work-item.field:
When you export a document via Word-Round trip you might want to have a separate title page without any header or footer.
  • Open your modified Round-trip Template again
  • Double click to modify document header
  • Select different first page in Design Tab

  • Modify your first page header e.g. add a different logo (you can also leave it empty. In this case your first page wonÂ´t have any header or footer)
  • Save file and reupload
  • Verify your first page is using a different header and footer.
